summary:
Applied AI / ML Engineer with nearly three years of experience spanning data engineering, applied machine learning, and GenAI systems. Strong background in building reliable data pipelines and analytics foundations, followed by hands-on ownership of ML- and LLM-driven systems including RAG pipelines, agentic chatbots, and hyper-personalized learning workflows.

Experienced in taking internal proof-of-concepts from data ingestion and modeling through experimentation, optimization, deployment, and platform integration. My work focuses on building AI systems that are measurable, scalable, and grounded in real product constraints such as latency, cost, and reliability.

GenAI / LLM Systems: Agentic AI systems with stateful, multi-step reasoning
Prompt design, refinement, and token reduction
Prompt evaluation using cosine similarity and BLEU score
Machine Learning: Clustering evaluation (Elbow method, Kneedle algorithm, Silhouette analysis)
Handling noisy real-world data and class imbalance
Cross-validation, metric selection, and tradeoff analysis
Feature engineering from structured and unstructured data
Classical ML algorithms (linear regression, logistic regression, clustering)
Backend, Architecture & Performance: API-based integration of ML and LLM systems
Flask-based backend services and REST APIs
Data Engineering & Analytics: Power BI dashboards and internal analytics
Data quality checks, validation, and logging
Azure Storage (Blob Storage, Data Lake Gen2)
Data modeling for analytics and ML workloads
Programming & Core Languages: Python (ML pipelines, data processing, LLM workflows)
SQL (complex queries, joins, aggregations, stored procedures)
Basic JavaScript (frontend integration for internal tools)

GenAI / LLM Systems: Prompt design, optimization, and token reduction
Machine Learning: Handling temporal and sequential data patterns
Cross-validation, metric selection, and tradeoff analysis
Feature engineering from structured and unstructured data
Engineering & Platform: Internal CI/CD exposure and deployment workflows
Azure ecosystem (ADF, Databricks, Storage, Managed Identities)
Data Engineering & Analytics Foundations: Data quality checks, logging, and error handling
SQL query optimization and stored procedures
Data modeling for analytics and ML workloads

featuredProjects.title: Mental Health Relapse Prediction System
featuredProjects.goal: Estimate relapse risk and surface contextual clinical guidance
highlights: Built an ML pipeline using PHQ-9, DSM-5, patient journals, and clinician notes
Performed sentiment, frequency, and contextual feature extraction
Modeled relapse risk as a continuous score
Evaluated multiple approaches using cross-validated metrics
Selected LSTM-based models for temporal pattern learning
Added a RAG-based intervention layer aligned with medical best practices
Deployed using Flask + React with Docker and real-time DB sync

featuredProjects.title: Diabetes Risk Prediction & Monitoring System
featuredProjects.goal: Predict diabetes risk and provide contextual interventions
highlights: Developed a questionnaire-driven chatbot to collect KPIs
Implemented scheduled retraining with checkpointing and best-model selection
Built a two-tier Flask architecture with containerized deployment

featuredProjects.title: LLM-Based Resume Screening System
highlights: Built a resume screening system using vector databases and RAG
Indexed resumes and job descriptions for semantic retrieval
Designed similarity-based scoring for candidate ranking
Reduced manual screening effort and improved consistency
